name: Potatomans little adventure
description:
Potatoman's grandma is sick and needs his help.

You take control of that brave little potato and help him pass the adventures that may arise.

---- 

This is a remake of the original potatoman's little adventure, a short adventure game from the year 2005. The graphics style is left as it was, but scaled to HD so with a little more detail.
All the typos are left as they were and the music/sounds still is 100% the original.

Have fun playing this game and leave some reaction.
